name: Task Manager â€“ System booster
description: Simple and free but effective task manager aimed at speeding up your smartphone.   Task Manager  - Clear memory to boost the system - Simple design with high performance   Memory Booster - Clear app caches - Remove the memory of unused apps - Easy boost in 1 tap only!   Cache clear Easily clear the cache with 1 tap - Delete unnecessary temporary files created by apps - Increase the free space of the storage - Delete the cache of the apps - Simple cache cleaner   Overview screen Displays the following at once: - RAM usage  - ROM usage - Installed apps  - Battery status   Useful uninstaller - Easily uninstall memory consuming apps - Securely delete data - History of uninstalled apps is removed as well   Easy operation - No tedious configuration required - Just press the Boost button to speed up your smartphone   Long lasting battery - This task killer can kill the processes running in background, making the battery life longer.   Preserve the Bluelight Filter app If you are using Bluelight Filter to protect your eye from hurting light, you might have noticed that other task managers and app killers forcibly turn off the filter automatically. This task manager will preserve the Bluelight Filter.   Remove ads with the paid version Follow the link below to purchase the paid version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.avrilapp.appskiller.key
